Name: Red Breast
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: POUR first three ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly stir. DRIZZLE raspberry liqueur over surface of drink.
Review: Scotch, lime juice and ginger beer, flavoured and made a tad pink by raspberry liqueur.
History: Created in 2004 by Wayne Collins , London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Red Breast contains 188 calories
